scripts.reset: rm -f package-lock.json && rm -rf ./node_modules && rm -rf ./.next && npm install --no-fund --no-audit
scripts.reset-win: del /s /q package-lock.json && echo 'Borrando node_modules...' && rmdir /s /q node_modules && echo 'Borrando .next...' && rmdir /s /q .next && cls && echo 'Instalando Dependencias' && npm install --no-fund --no-audit
scripts.supa:types: npx supabase gen types typescript --local > src/database/types.ts
scripts.supa:remotetypes: npx supabase gen types typescript --project-id kfyzyoupthjxuidzbvxr > src/database/remote-types.ts
